channel.title: self on Amrit's Corner
channel.description: Recent content in self on Amrit's Corner

item.title: Realization
item.description: I have been wondering why I suck at what I do, why I’m the least skilled among my skilled peers. After pondering on it for a while, I have come to realise - I simply do not do what I want, instead I chase after what I think I want which will lead me to become more skilled. But I realise that now as I see at my past self, who got me to the point where I am today, by doing what I wanted.
